module.name: CvzMMCM
module.description: Implement the Multi Modal Convergence Map (MMCM)
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long: An implementation of the MMCM algorithm as described in REF. Basically provide a multi-modal self organizing map that learns sensory motor contingencies among the modalities connected.

param.desc: Point to the config file containing the definition of modalities.
Specify the name of the cvz. It will act as a prefix for all ports
Specify the width of the map.
Specify the height of the map.
Specify the layers count of the map.
